ToConverter.InterpreterModifier: $(Input)
($(Input)) * Property(StockLocation,@../ClassEmpire, GameSpeedMultiplier) * Property(StockLocation, @../ClassEmpire, DustInflation)

Property(ScrappedElement, @../ClassEmpire, CanSellImprovements) * (0.15 * $(Input) * Property(ScrappedElement, @../ClassEmpire, GameSpeedMultiplier)) * Property(ScrappedElement, @../ClassEmpire,ImprovementScrapValueModifier)
$(Input) * Property(StockLocation, @../ClassEmpire, RatioOfProductionSpentGainedAsMoney)
$(Input) * Property(StockLocation, @../ClassEmpire, RatioOfProductionSpentGainedAsEmpirePoint)
$(Input)
$(Input) * 2.5
5 * Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, Population) * Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, GameSpeedMultiplier)
5 * Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, Population) * Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, GameSpeedMultiplier)
$(Input) * 0.1 * Property(StockLocation, @../ClassEmpire, GameSpeedMultiplier) * Property(StockLocation, @../ClassEmpire/ClassSenate, LawCancelCostMultiplier)
$(Input) * 0
$(Input)

Min(100, 100 * $(Input) / Max(1, (5 * Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, NetEmpireMoney) + Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, BankAccount))) * ((5 * Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, NetEmpireMoney) + Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, BankAccount)) + (5 * Property(OtherEmpire, NetEmpireMoney) + Property(OtherEmpire, BankAccount))) / Max(1, Max((5 * Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, NetEmpireMoney) + Property(StockLocation, @ClassEmpire, BankAccount)), (5 * Property(OtherEmpire, NetEmpireMoney) + Property(OtherEmpire, BankAccount)))))
$(Input)
(($(Input)) ^ 1.2125 + 50) * Property(StockLocation, @../ClassEmpire,BuyoutActivated) * Property(StockLocation, @../ClassEmpire, DustInflation)

((($(Input)) ^ 1.1 + 100) * Count(StockLocation, @'ClassColonizedStarSystem')) +
((($(Input)) ^ 1.01 + 150) * Count(StockLocation, @'ClassEmpire'))
$(Input) * 1.4
$(Input)
$(Input)
$(Input)
$(Input)
$(Input)
